title: Big Nudes
description: Profile of a nude woman's legs in white.  (Dark orange border creates optical illusion of glass by distorting legs where it overlaps them.) Background within border is lighter orange. Text at bottom left in red reads: Big Nudes; at right:  Visual Arts Gallery/ 209 East 23rd Street/ New York City
